A4.text: It was only a half-century later with the work of Kepler and Galileo that any substantial evidence defending Copernicanism appeared.

A5.text: Nicolaus Copernicus (19 February 1473 â€“ 24 May 1543) was a Renaissance polymath who formulated a model of the universe that placed the Sun rather than Earth at its center.
